Import CCLE mutation data

Source: R/ccle.R
CCLEMutationData.Rd

Import CCLE mutation data

CCLEMutationData(release = NULL)

Arguments

release

character(1) or NULL. DepMap quarterly release ID (e.g. "20Q3"). If left NULL, defaults to latest supported release.

Value

CCLEMutationData.

Note

Updated 2020-09-30.

Examples

object <- CCLEMutationData()

#> → Importing ccle_mutations.csv from DepMap `20Q3` release.
#> → Caching URL at <https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/24613355>.
#> → Importing 66c849b189e6_24613355 at /Users/mike/Library/Caches/DepMapAnalysis using vroom::`vroom()`.
dim(object)

#> [1] 1296237      34
